1:
A continual desire to sin is in the inner beings of wicked people.\q1 They consider that they do not need to have an awesome respect for God.
\q1
2:
Because they want to believe good things about themselves,\q2 they do not think that God knows and hates their sins.


\q1
3:
Everything that they say is deceitful and full of lies;\q2 they no longer do what is good
\q2 and are no longer wise.
\q1
4:
While they are lying on their beds, they plan to do things to harm others;\q2 they are determined to do things that are not good,
\q2 and they never refuse to do what is evil.



\q1
5:
Yahweh, your faithful love for us reaches as high as the heavens;\q2 your faithfulness in doing what you have promised extends up to the clouds.
\q1
6:
Your righteous behavior is as permanent as the highest mountains;\q2 your acting justly will continue as long as the deepest oceans will continue.
\q1 You take care of people and you take care of animals.


\q1
7:
God, your faithful love for us is very precious.\q1 You protect us like birds protect their baby birds under their wings .
\q1
8:
You provide for us plenty of food from the abundant supply that you have;\q2 your great gifts flow to us like a river.
\q1
9:
You are the one who causes everything to live;\q2 your light is what enables us to know the truth about you.



\q1
10:
Continue to faithfully love those who are faithful to you,\q2 and protect those who act righteously.
\q1
11:
Do not allow proud people to attack me,\q2 or allow wicked people to chase me away.
\q1
12: Look where evil people have fallen on the ground, defeated;\q2 they were thrown down, and they will never rise again.
